医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
果蝇大脑连接组为理解大脑功能和行为提供了关键线索由美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 支持的一个科学小组公布了第一张完整的普通果蝇大脑神经连接图。该图提供了一个接线图，称为连接组，是有史以来最大、最完整的成年动物连接组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Fruit-fly-brain-connectome-offers-ritic-clues-for-understanding-brain-function-and-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Fruit-fly-brain-connectome-offers-ritic-clues-for-understanding-brain-function-and-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c49437b-77df-4cb5-b4d2-055848079a11 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 02:16:59 -0400 Fruit fly brain connectome offers critical clues for understanding brain function and behavior
加强医疗保健系统中实用临床试验结果的采用由哈佛朝圣者医疗保健研究所与杜克大学和凯撒永久华盛顿健康研究所合作领导的一项新思想文章强调了医疗保健研究人员和决策者在不断变化的医疗保健环境中寻求改善人口健康所面临的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Enhancing-the-adoption-of-pragmatic-clinical-trial-results-in-healthcare-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Enhancing-the-adoption-of-pragmatic-clinical-trial-results-in-healthcare-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9ed1023-101a-4cc5-826c-a81ceebe5871 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 02:13:57 -0400
世卫组织新支持工具推动远程医疗一体化世界卫生组织（WHO，欧洲区域）推出了一项资源，帮助世界各地的医疗保健系统实施远程医疗服务。该工具名为“加强远程医疗支持工具”，由加泰罗尼亚大学 (UOC) 的研究人员开发，是其作为世卫组织电子卫生合作中心 2018 年至 2024 年间工作的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Telemedicine-integration-gets-boost-from-WHOe28099s-new-support-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Telemedicine-integration-gets-boost-from-WHOe28099s-new-support-tool.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27bb63ea-48c3-42af-a6b1-e4012c1ecf56 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 02:07:05 -0400 Telemedicine integration gets boost from WHO’s new support tool
Revvity 的 EUROIMMUN 推出针对阿尔茨海默病相关 APOE 基因特定分型的解决方案Revvity, Inc. 今天宣布在接受 CE 标志的欧洲国家推出体外诊断 EURORealTime™ APOE 检测，这将实现 APOE 基因的准确基因分型。 APOE 基因分型对于在开始针对阿尔茨海默病的抗淀粉样蛋白 (β) 治疗之前评估患者出现副作用的风险很有价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Revvitys-EUROIMMUN-launches-solution-for-specific-typing-of-Alzheimers-disease-linked-APOE-gene.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Revvitys-EUROIMMUN-launches-solution-for-specific-typing-of-Alzheimers-disease- Associated-APOE-gene.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46afa9b5-78e8-43ef-b575-881a669da9b6 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 02:03:00 -0400
研究揭示单增李斯特菌如何在营养不良的环境中生存通常用于检查医院或农业食品工业中是否存在微生物的检测测试基于微生物生长，即实验室培养待检查样品中的微生物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Study-uncovers-how-listeria-monocytogenes-survives-in- Nutrition-poor-environments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Study-uncovers-how-listeria-monocytogenes-survives-in- Nutrition-poor-environments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ffd47d1-b3f6-4cb4-8e9b-cd4f81b5a5a8 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 02:01:21 -0400 Study uncovers how listeria monocytogenes survives in nutrient-poor environments
生物电子“活药房”植入物可以改变糖尿病和肥胖症的护理卡内基梅隆大学领导的研究团队获得了健康高级研究计划局 (ARPA-H) 高达 3490 万美元的资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/BioElectronic-living-pharmacy-implant-could-transform-diabetes-and-obesity-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/BioElectronic-living-pharmacy-implant-could-transform-diabetes-and-obesity-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16accd35-fd69-406c-9f80-bc8ad4b4309a Thu, 03 Oct 2024 01:52:45 -0400 Bioelectronic 'living pharmacy' implant could transform diabetes and obesity care
探索黑色素在近红外光谱测量结果中的作用近红外光谱 (NIRS) 是一种无创方法，用于监测体内血红蛋白浓度和氧气水平的变化。该技术涉及使近红外光（主要在 650 至 900 nm 范围内）穿过组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Exploring-the-role-of-melanin-in-near-infrared-spectroscopy-measurement-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Exploring-the-role-of-melanin-in-near-infrared-spectroscopy-measurement-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=469ce643-ea44-4e6f-a6ad-f72bb23fc009 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 01:39:24 -0400 Exploring the role of melanin in near-infrared spectroscopy measurement outcomes
植入式装置彻底改变了甲状腺管理卡内基梅隆大学领导的团队获得了健康高级研究计划局 (ARPA-H) 高达 4200 万美元的资助，以加速开发可植入的、基于细胞的生物电子设备，以提供针对患者的治疗和监测疾病实时了解甲状腺功能减退症和甲状腺功能亢进症等疾病的状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Carnegie-Mellon-led-team-develops-implantable-cell-based-bioElectronic-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Carnegie-Mellon-led-team-develops-implantable-cell-based-bioElectronic-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58ef6bf3-cec6-49a9-917f-46ef42e0cfa4 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 01:38:00 -0400 Implantable device revolutionizes thyroid management
使用先进的人工智能筛查工具改善近视黄斑病变的早期发现近视眼的发病率呈上升趋势，特别是在儿童中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Using-advanced-AI-screening-tools-to-improve-early-detection-of-myopic-maculopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Using-advanced-AI-screening-tools-to-improve-early-detection-of-myopic-maculopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc9a4bd2-81e4-4912-a74d-d90dda40e5cd Thu, 03 Oct 2024 01:32:04 -0400 Using advanced AI screening tools to improve early detection of myopic maculopathy
SWOG S1011 试验质疑扩大淋巴结切除术治疗膀胱癌的益处SWOG S1011 随机 3 期试验发现，无病生存率或总生存率没有显着改善，但 3-4 级不良事件发生率较高，术后 90 天内死亡风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/SWOG-S1011-Trial-questions-the-benefits-of-extended-lymphadenection-in-bladder-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/SWOG-S1011-Trial-questions-the-benefits-of-extended-lymphadenection-in-bladder-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7b8784b-f1e0-4b20-9e7a-788cf23b2860 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 01:23:52 -0400 SWOG S1011 trial questions the benefits of extended lymphadenectomy in bladder cancer
